name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Intermediate Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **Ruby on Rails**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**, with a strong background in full stack development. Hands-on expertise in building and deploying cloud-native applications using **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and CI/CD tools such as **CircleCI** and **GitHub Actions**. Experienced with databases like **PostgreSQL** and search engines like **Elasticsearch**. 

Demonstrated ability in implementing robust **Infrastructure as Code** strategies and ensuring continuous integration and deployment. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams while maintaining clear and effective communication. Strongly committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with industry standards.
